" You are opening Assisted Location Mode (VPU), please be careful Read the following: 1. Please make sure the light is greater than 15Lx, the ground texture is clear and wide Flying in a wide area, the height is limited to 0.5 meters to 2.5 meters, otherwise there will be danger. 2. During flight, when the auxiliary positioning mode is invalid, the aircraft will Automatically switch to Attitude mode, requires you to have Attitude mode The flight experience and skills below can be used to fly safely. 3. Any accidents caused by indoor flying are not The drone is covered by insurance, please install the protective frame carefully flight. "
The indicator light of the body will automatically dim when taking pictures (invalid in attitude mode)
Photos are automatically saved to the phone album
More and more interesting one-button control functions are all in this treasure box

"Please use the battery power to 15%, and leave it at rest until the power is 0. The battery will automatically update capacity"

"When setting pointing flight, please pay attention to setting the flight of the aircraft Height, try to choose in a wide venue, avoid crowds, tall buildings, Obstacles such as trees, high-voltage lines, signal towers, etc., to avoid Danger. "

" You are turning on forced attitude (ATTI) mode, please be careful Read the following: 1. Forced Attitude Mode is only available for experienced flight attendants Used by players, the auxiliary positioning mode will be turned off in this mode and GPS mode. 2. The aircraft may drift in forced attitude mode, so it is necessary to You manually control the aircraft to hover in real time with the stick, there is a determine risk. 3. The following functions are unavailable: automatic takeoff, automatic landing, Point-and-click flight, route flight, and flight around the point. 4. In the forced attitude mode, any accident caused by the drone, Not covered by personal accident insurance and third party liability insurance within. "

Push the right stick forward, the aircraft moves forward, pull the right stick backward, the aircraft goes backward
Push the right stick to the left, the aircraft will fly to the left, push the right stick to the right, and the aircraft will fly to the right
Push the left stick forward, the aircraft altitude will rise, pull the left stick backward, the aircraft altitude will drop
Push the left stick to the left, the nose will turn to the left, push the left stick to the right, the nose will turn to the right
Learn before, have you learned it now?
If you are flying Xiaomi drone for the first time, you must complete 60 minutes of flying before turning off the beginner mode.
Flying speed will be limited in beginner mode.
In beginner mode, the flight height is limited to 50m and the flight distance is limited to 100m.
Short press and then long press the auto take-off and landing button to automatically land
Place the aircraft on a flat road 5m away, make sure the power button and auto take-off and landing button indicator lights of the remote control are white
Operate the joystick to control the aircraft to fly
short press and then long press the auto takeoff and landing button to take off automatically
Start the motor: move the left and right joysticks to the inner eight characters, and release the joystick immediately after the motor starts up

Emergency Shutdown: Press and hold the power button and the auto takeoff and landing button for 5 seconds at the same time, until the beeping sound of the remote control stops completely. (emergency use only)
Stop motor: After the aircraft landed on the ground, pull down the throttle stick to the maximum position, and the motor will stop within 5 seconds.
Open the tripod and place the aircraft on a stable ground
Be sure to keep the tail facing you during takeoff, landing and flight
One ​​end of the battery is the tail and the other end is the head
Please keep a distance of more than 5m from the aircraft
Please choose to fly in an open field
Please avoid crowds, tall buildings, trees, high-voltage lines, signal towers and other obstacles, as well as highways, railways and other flying
Do not fly in strong wind, rain and snow
In order to master basic flying knowledge as soon as possible and ensure flight safety, please read the following carefully
Beginner mode flight distance is limited to 100 meters and flight height is limited to 50 meters
